Mosquitoes aren't just pesky nuisances they also carry deadly diseases like seek a virus and malaria the world Health Organization says two hundred sixteen million people were infected with malaria in twenty sixteen alone
Killing four hundred and forty five thousand but researchers at imperial college London use gene editing tool to sterilize a population of malaria carrying mosquitoes
By modifying the double sex gene that determines if a mosquito is male or female the scientists were able to control how the mosquitoes develop
According to their research published in the journal nature biotechnology
The male mosquitoes develop normally but female mosquitoes were unable to reproduce and didn't develop the long needle the attachment that sucks out our blood in the laboratory experiment one hundred percent of the mosquitoes were affected after several generations leading to a population collapse
